feed.title: Seeking advice: Encouraging bug-fixing over new features

entry.title: Seeking advice: Encouraging bug-fixing over new features
entry.summary: In a discussion thread, Rick Wesson suggests putting a bounty on a test framework. He proposes using GoogleTest, a C++ testing framework, and provides a link to the list of C++ frameworks on Wikipedia. Another contributor notes that the boost testing framework is already implemented but lacks tests. No further information is provided in the context.
